title: When You Have a Strong-Willed Child
itunes:author: Guest: Cynthia Tobias
itunes:summary:
Every child has a unique, God-given personality. But what do you do when your son or daughter is always determined to get his or her way? John and Danny give some hope to parents with a strong-willed son or daughter. Featuring guest Cynthia Tobias.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Cynthia Tobias' book "You Can't Make Me (But I Can Be Persuaded)" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-08-12?refcd=1123803

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/when-you-have-a-strong-willed-child/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
